title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
description: Copilot in Consumer Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.  this feature has been delivered but is not in scope for the commercial roadmap and is being removed to reduce confusion.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  A new item will be published in the future for the commercial customers.
